mapper.insert: insert into topic(topicid , ordersid , usersid , foodsid , num , contents , addtime ) values(#{topicid} , #{ordersid} , #{usersid} , #{foodsid} , #{num} , #{contents} , #{addtime} )
mapper.update: update topic set ordersid=#{ordersid} , usersid=#{usersid} , foodsid=#{foodsid} , num=#{num} , contents=#{contents} , addtime=#{addtime} where topicid=#{topicid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.ordercode , c.username , d.foodsname from topic a , orders b , users c , foods d where a.ordersid = b.ordersid and a.usersid = c.usersid and a.foodsid = d.foodsid order by topicid desc

select a.* , b.ordercode , c.username , d.foodsname from topic a , orders b , users c , foods d where a.ordersid = b.ordersid and a.usersid = c.usersid and a.foodsid = d.foodsid and topicid=#{topicid} order by topicid desc

select a.* , b.ordercode , c.username , d.foodsname from topic a , orders b , users c , foods d where a.ordersid = b.ordersid and a.usersid = c.usersid and a.foodsid = d.foodsid
and b.ordercode like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{ordersid}, '%'))
and c.username like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{usersid}, '%'))
and d.foodsname like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{foodsid}, '%'))
and a.num like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{num}, '%'))
and a.contents like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{contents}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
